channel.title: Help with PK POINTS
channel.description:
Okay just about every server I see, it has PK Points... well I showed everyone my Clan Wars release, but I still some help with some things... so what I need is a way to make Clan Wars points... but heres what I need
-The Clan Wars points (so when you kill someone in Clan Wars it gives you points) -A Clan Wars Zone (kind of like the nonWild() thing, only clanWars() instead, so that the game recognizes that you are in Clan Wars and when you kill someone in the Clan Wars Zone, it gives you Clan Wars points... get it?)
so yeah those are just a few things I need help with (yes I will give credits when I show/release Clan Wars v2. but still a long way away from v2. but if you would like to help, pm me, or if you know the answer right off, just post a comment on how I could do it, not a full fucking description that is in almost perfect detail, just basic directions that will get me started... thanks
(again, I will give credits to those people that help me)

item.title: Help with PK POINTS
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“00rYn00, post:11, topic:227229”]yeah okay i have the public boolean clanWars() already… and i have the absX and absY stuff down, but I’ll add the other stuff to it… and see if it works…

EDIT-

I keep getting an error saying

“else without if”[/quote]then add an if after the else?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with PK POINTS
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

yeah okay i have the public boolean clanWars() already… and i have the absX and absY stuff down, but I’ll add the other stuff to it… and see if it works…

item.title: Help with PK POINTS
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“00rYn00, post:9, topic:227229”][quote author=Jordiescape link=topic=298590.msg2398421#msg2398421 date=1219278987]
No, you would add something like this into the void youdied().

if(clanWars()) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; heightLevel = 0; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you died!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(!clanWars()) {
Also, you would add an extra bracket to the end of youdied().
EDIT:That’s to make it so you don’t loose items BTW.
[/quote]

yeah but still, how could I make it to where when you kill someone in clan wars, it gives you clan wars points?
also I’m trying to do this thing where instead of Danger and Safe zones, I would also have a Clan Wars zone, so that it would show Clan Wars on the side instead of Danger on the side…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2008, 03:39:38 pm[/size][hr]anyone??[/quote]
To do that you could add something like this in your public boolean clanWars(), so example:

public boolean clanWars() { // By Jordie if(absX >= XCOORD && absX <= XCOORD && absY >= YCOORD && absY <= YCOORD) clanPoints(); return true; else return false; }
I think, not sure, not thinking.
In the void clanPoints() you could add something like this…

public void clanPoints() { if killplayershithere clanPks =+ 1;? //You could make the interface change if you're in clanwars, by using the public boolean clanWars, To be honest I'm not sure.

Read full topic

Also, you would add an extra bracket to the end of youdied().
EDIT:That’s to make it so you don’t loose items BTW.[/quote]

yeah but still, how could I make it to where when you kill someone in clan wars, it gives you clan wars points?
also I’m trying to do this thing where instead of Danger and Safe zones, I would also have a Clan Wars zone, so that it would show Clan Wars on the side instead of Danger on the side…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2008, 03:39:38 pm[/size][hr]anyone??

Read full topic

item.title: Help with PK POINTS
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

No, you would add something like this into the void youdied().

if(clanWars()) { teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; heightLevel = 0; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you died!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(!clanWars()) {
Also, you would add an extra bracket to the end of youdied().
EDIT:That’s to make it so you don’t loose items BTW.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with PK POINTS
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

yeah Jordie i like your first post better because you got what i was saying for the clan wars arena, i really appreciate your help, so please revise this and tell me if this is right…

i would make a boolean like…

public boolean clanWars() { // By Jordie
	if(absX >= XCOORD && absX <= XCOORD && absY >= YCOORD && absY <= YCOORD)
	return true;
	else
		return false;
}

then i would make… i’m not sure if it’s a boolean or an int… i think its a boolean, for my clanwarspoints would it be


public boolean clanWarsPoints () {

then make something like


if clanWars = true {
... 
}

am I at least on the right track?
and i still wouldnt know how to make the points…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with PK POINTS
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“WRX`, post:5, topic:227229”]Yeah, you could learn how to do that from my Tutorial island tut.

Link is in my Signature. You would ofllow first few steps in client.java about saving and loading then declare ints in the server.java, then you could use …

if (pkPoints == 1) {
blah blah
}

You get the drift.[/quote]
Yeah, make a new one using character tokens, like WRX said there’s a good example of them in his tutorial, so like this: (Depending on what you made)
if (clanKills == 1) {
some stuff
sendMessage("You killed sumone naow ur points r " + clanKills + “kay”);?
}
Me thinks.

Read full topic

blah blah
}

You get the drift.

@Jordiescape wrote:

Use something like this:

public boolean loseNoItems() { // By Jordie if(absX >= 2589 && absX <= 2620 && absY >= 4761 && absY <= 4788) return true; else return false; }
But adapt it.
